first_para: Dame Margaret Anne Begg DBE (born 6 December 1955) is a British Labour Party politician, who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Aberdeen South since 1997.

full.extract:
Dame Margaret Anne Begg DBE (born 6 December 1955) is a British Labour Party politician, who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Aberdeen South since 1997.
She is the first permanent wheelchair user in the House of Commons since 1880.
full.title: Anne Begg
